long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VetRec helps automate generating clinical notes for veterinarians. The VetRec extension allows you to stay in your flow by having your scribe available at your fingertips at all time. Have your scribe side by side with your PiMS to easily record sessions and directly add information right into their file.
